comment: Professor Scar is an amazing teacher. Her class can be long and boring at times, but she is a very involved and makes the class worth attending. Class is mandatory and u get 5 free days to miss, but I recommend going. Do the hw, the class is fast paced. She gives out extra credit and drops 3 out of 6 of the lowest quiz grades. She's super awesome.
She is a great professor! If you do not understand math she will help you. Overall, she is wonderful. Take her, she drops the lowest grade.

Very helpful.  If she's teaching...take her.  She's also a HS math teacher so not on campus alot but she does respond to email.  Give good example and quizes often.  I cracked the textbook one time but I understand math pretty well.  Got an easy A and went on to 1106 with the knowledge from her and managed a solid A there as well.
great prof...im really bad in math and she made it easier to understand...she is real nice too...i totally recommend her

Professor Scar is awesome!!  She makes it very easy to understand what could potentially be really confusing math problems.  She does a daily quiz every day, so you don't want to miss class at all!  She's tedious, but very helpful and very nice!  I would definitely recommend her.

I love her! She is so organized, it's amazing. I wish all teachers were as clear and prepared as she is. She emails you the outlines and examples for each class, all you have to do is print them out and show up with a pencil and a calculator!  She also gives chances for extra credit on each test and throughout the semester.  Fantastic teacher!

SHE IS AWESOME!!!  I had not done math in 15 years. so I was worried.  She walks you through all the processes and then give you pracitce tests.  Quizes are take home and unles you are a total dud - this class is a breeze.  I never did any of the practice homework and got a high A!

She extremely easy. Math is the hardest subject for me and the class was so easy. She prints out fill in notes for the class, hands out TAKE HOME quizzes and her tests come from the take home quizzes, just different numbers! She explains things so well and at times almost too much.
GREAT Prof. Math is the hardest subject for me and her clarity made it easy. Always cheerful and willing to help. I would take any math class from Ms Scar again.
